title: They’re Accomplices To Mass Murder (Ep 1817)
description:
The Biden administration is an accomplice to a mass murder. In this episode, I address the hard reality that our POTUS is complicit. 

News Picks:


Meet the Russiagate Prober Who Couldn't Verify Anything in the Steele Dossier Yet Said Nothing for Years.


Fauci Would Push 'More Stringent Restrictions' If He Could Redo COVID Response.


Biden’s new cybersecurity czar would rather waste time on “systemic racism.”

WashPost 'Fact Checkers' Now Fighting with 'RNC Research' Twitter.

Maryland school district bars staff from telling parents about gender transitions.


Soros-backed group purchasing 18 Spanish-language radio stations to suppress 'disinformation.’


Attorney General Merrick Garland stops short of calling crime wave a crisis: 'Matter of considerable concern.’

Biden wants to give illegal immigrants temporary ID cards.
